name: The Undead War
description:
Take the role of the army commander for the habitants of Nardia. Strategically navigate your way through the hordes of undead by building your perfect army to achieve victory in this roguelike auto battle simulator. Refine your tactics, use magic, upgrade your fighters, and make your way through the tech tree to unlock even more powers and upgrades to defeat the undead.





Lead your chosen race to victory, with each race having their own spell powers that have both strengths and weaknesses.



Strategically choosing your fighters and their position on the battlefield ​will greatly affect your chance of victory.



Earn Dark souls and spend them on persistent rewards in the upgrade tree to maximize your chance of victory.



Choose from unique spells and powers to help your army on the battlefield.



For your fun and replayability.
